data.title: Reef Distribution
data.meta_description: New Immersive Content for your Dome and Giant Screen! Fulldome Shows Available from Reef Distribution.
data.text:
WELCOME TO REEF DISTRIBUTION

We Ignite Curiosity and Inspire Awe Through the Power of Immersive Storytelling.

Fulldome Shows

Fulldome Shows

Reef Distribution has more than 40+ fulldome shows from 29 producers available for Planetariums and Fulldome Theaters worldwide. We’ll help you select the right show for your unique audience, and we’ll support you from licensing to launch!

Giant & Flat Screen Movies

Giant & Flat Screen Movies

Produced for IMAX® and Giant Screen Theaters, these movies provide an immersive cinematic experience. Stunning visuals transport audiences from the depths of the ocean, across the globe, and to the far reaches of space.

Reef Originals

Reef Originals

Our original shows are audience pleasing and award winning! Reef Originals are produced by our sister company, Softmachine Immersive Productions, for Fulldome and other formats. These shows are available in any language upon request.

Choose Your Next Incredible Show!

Your Partner in Success

We don’t just distribute shows—we cultivate relationships.

Our experienced team will help you select the best show for your unique audience.

Stay Updated!

Get special pricing and industry news!

I have agreed to the terms & conditions.

Leave this field empty if you're human:

Celebrating 20 Years!

In 2004, we released our first show, Kaluoka’hina: The Enchanted Reef. And with that, Reef Distribution was born. Since then, we’ve produced more award-winning, original shows with our sister company, Softmachine, become the distributor for dozens more shows from innovative filmmakers around the globe, and brought enthusiastic audiences to theaters and planetariums around the world. Thank you for being the most important part of our success story. We’re looking forward to the next 20 years!

Got Content?

Are you a storyteller with a show that might be right for fulldome, flat screen, or giant screen theaters? With a worldwide network of clients, Reef Distribution can bring your show to a global audience. Be sure to check the Production FAQs for helpful information.

Where education and entertainment meet on the screen.

About Reef

Reef Distribution is an expert in the distribution and marketing of immersive edutainment that makes a positive impact on the audience.

Our Partners

FAQs

Do you provide strategic marketing and promotional support when we open your shows?

Yes, we love planning new film launches and sharing proven concepts. We can provide ideas for you to implement that generate free publicity and high attendance to your theater. We also create custom marketing tools upon request.

What licensing options do you offer?

We offer Flat Fee and Gate Share options. Our goal is to help make quality shows affordable for all domes.

What content is available from Reef?

Reef distributes content produced for planetariums and museums worldwide. This content includes fulldome shows and flat screen movies, including films for IMAX® and Giant Screen theaters.

What are Reef Originals?

Reef Originals are fulldome shows produced by our sister company, Softmachine Immersive Productions. Our current Reef Originals are:

Kaluoka’hina: The Enchanted Reef

Legend of the Enchanted Reef

Little Major Tom — Into the Unknown

The Secrets of Gravity

The Life of Trees

Realm of Light

Do you offer discounts for school-based or nonprofit planetariums?

Our prices are based on the number of seats in your dome. Plus, we take your annual attendance and programming schedule into consideration to be sure the price is appropriate for you, our customer.

Does Reef produce shows?

Reef distributes fulldome and giant screen films worldwide. Our sister company, Softmachine Immersive Productions, has been producing fulldome shows since 2004, including all of our Reef Originals. Softmachine produces animated and live-action shows for planetariums, organizations, and companies. We also create custom marketing tools upon request.
